mapper.sql: update sys_building_tab set is_del = 'Y' where id = #{b_id}

select count(distinct sbt.id)
select (@i:=@i+1) num,a.* from ( select sbt.`id`, sbt.`building_no`, sbt.`building_name`, sbt.`building_floors`, sbt.`building_addr`, sbt.`building_type`, sbt.`building_structure`, sbt.`building_toward`, DATE_FORMAT (sbt.`create_date`,'%Y-%m-%d %T') `create_date`, sbt.`remark`
from sys_building_tab sbt where 1=1 and sbt.is_del = 'N'
and sut.user_name LIKE '%${columns[0][search][value]}%'
order by sbt.create_date desc limit ${page_start},${page_end} ) a,(select @i:= ${page_start} ) it
